title: Mobile Casinos with Bitcoin Technology
text:
Since it first came to the market, Bitcoin has been a popular Blockchain technology digital currency. It has also given the world a quick look at possible ways to complete transactions in the future. Luckily, the future is already here as casinos are now accepting Bitcoins as one of the currencies. Mobile casinos provide a chance to play on the go straight from your mobile device. Those that accept the Bitcoin allow for the use of one of the most secure payment methods around the world.

Why Bitcoin?

As mentioned earlier, Bitcoin is a cryptocurrency. This means that it is digital, decentralised currency that is not tied to any bank. The use of Blockchain technology makes it a secure currency that can be used in outlets around the world, including casinos. The best way to obtain coins for your casino gaming is by buying them from online vendors. You can also mine Bitcoin. However, the share amount of computing resources and the period taken to mine significant amounts makes this method unattractive.

You will be required to have an online Bitcoin wallet to store and make payments with the coins. There are tens of such wallets online. There are even a few that allow you to convert your coins into Fiat currency. Your coin winnings can be used directly to make payments at outlets that accept cryptocurrency.

Where should You Play with Bitcoin?

There are several casinos where you can play with Bitcoin. However, not all of them are recommended as some have poor service reputations. Here are a few things to keep in mind when looking for a legit mobile Bitcoin Casino to play with Bitcoins.

Gambling watchdogs must license every casino in their jurisdiction. The casinos must also be accredited by professional gambling bodies. The accreditation and licensing information is usually found at the bottom of the page. Look for a license from one of the reputable gambling authorities such as Malta Gambling Authority, Gibraltar Gambling Commission and UK Gambling Commission.

The casino must also be linked to responsible gambling organisations. These are the organisations that help prevent and resolve issues with gambling. They include Responsible Gambling Trust, GamCare and GambleAware, among others.

You need a mobile casino that has a wide choice of games. You can tell by just looking at the number of providers available on the website and going through online reviews.You may also check the number of games available in each category of the casino. The wider the choice, the better the experience at the casino.

Quality of service

It would be best if you were sure that the casino indeed pays after winning. With Bitcoin, you expect instant payments after making a withdrawal request. The casino should also have a functional and friendly customer service team that is available around the clock and reachable via a variety of methods. These methods include chat, email, phone and social media. It is easy to check the response times by generating a ticket on the site. You may also look at reviews to determine the quality of customer experience on the site.

Getting Started

Most mobile Bitcoin casinos have apps besides a web-based mobile casino. The app provides a personalised gaming experience. Therefore, it is recommended that you go for the app. However, you can still use the HTML-based site and play your favourite games. Open an account in your preferred Bitcoin casino and make your first deposit. Be sure to check out the welcome bonuses available at the casino and redeem them.

The legality of Bitcoin gaming depends on the rules of your country. If a casino is legal, the inclusion of Bitcoins should not affect its status. However, it is good to check if your country is among the allowed nations by the casino.

Conclusion

Bitcoin is a revolutionary payment method that is safe, instant and somewhat anonymous. There are several mobile casinos on the internet with varying offers to their clients. You can enjoy your favourite slots, table games, video poker and live casino games while transacting with Bitcoin. Use the criterion discussed above when choosing your mobile casino for the best experience.
